## setOrdering() function

Sets ordering for grid

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function setOrdering<TOrdering>(ordering: TOrdering): GridAction;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  ordering | <code>TOrdering</code> | Ordering to be set for grid |
